content:
Is it possible to override the default profile page?
For example I want to redirect users to https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigitalSpine/Spine-PractitionerRole instead of https://simplifier.net/packages/uk.spine.r4/2.0.1-dev/files/315355
which is hardcoded in several places especially in treeview rendering of profiles.
@Kevin Mayfield This happens to be the main topic of our next sprint.
So currently no. But hang in there : )
